about_the_game:
Imagindar is an online PvP Arena game that you can enjoy with your friends for free!
There are no predefined classes or heroes. In each match, you create your own class and play exactly how you want with complete freedom.
How will you build your dynamic class and outsmart your opponents?

CREATE YOUR CLASS


In every match, you design your own unique class by selecting abilities and items from an extensive list that aligns perfectly with your style of play.
Join the battle in Imagindar and unleash your imagination!

DYNAMIC MATCHES


Engage in thrilling battles where tactics and cunning are key to outsmarting your opponents.
Create your own maps and host unique servers. Dive into the action now!

KEY FEATURES


  • Create your own class
    Choose from over 100 abilities and 25 items to craft your own class each match, customizing it to perfectly align with your unique playstyle.
  • Different Game Modes
    Explore a variety of engaging game modes, each offering a unique and exciting gameplay experience. Choose the mode that suits your preferences and immerse yourself in thrilling challenges.
  • Multiple Maps
    Explore 9 captivating maps that await your strategic conquest, or unleash your creativity with our in-game map editor and craft your own unique battlegrounds.
  • Bots
    Hone your skills and test new strategies by battling against AI-controlled bots.
    Perfect your gameplay before taking on real opponents.
  • Voice Chat
    Communicate with your teammates and coordinate your tactics using in-game voice and text chat.
    Stay connected and strategize effectively to secure victory.
  • Replays
    Relive your most epic moments and analyze your gameplay with the replay feature.
    Study your strategies, improve your skills, and showcase your best plays.
  • Streaming Support
    Seamlessly integrate with Twitch and engage with your audience and build a community around your gaming adventures.
  • Low Minimum Requirements
    Enjoy the game on a wide range of PCs, including older systems.
    Experience smooth gameplay and immerse yourself in the action, regardless of your hardware, through a detailed option menu.
detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Imagindar is an online PvP Arena game that you can enjoy with your friends for free!
There are no predefined classes or heroes. In each match, you create your own class and play exactly how you want with complete freedom.
How will you build your dynamic class and outsmart your opponents?

CREATE YOUR CLASS


In every match, you design your own unique class by selecting abilities and items from an extensive list that aligns perfectly with your style of play.
Join the battle in Imagindar and unleash your imagination!

DYNAMIC MATCHES


Engage in thrilling battles where tactics and cunning are key to outsmarting your opponents.
Create your own maps and host unique servers. Dive into the action now!

KEY FEATURES


  • Create your own class
    Choose from over 100 abilities and 25 items to craft your own class each match, customizing it to perfectly align with your unique playstyle.
  • Different Game Modes
    Explore a variety of engaging game modes, each offering a unique and exciting gameplay experience. Choose the mode that suits your preferences and immerse yourself in thrilling challenges.
  • Multiple Maps
    Explore 9 captivating maps that await your strategic conquest, or unleash your creativity with our in-game map editor and craft your own unique battlegrounds.
  • Bots
    Hone your skills and test new strategies by battling against AI-controlled bots.
    Perfect your gameplay before taking on real opponents.
  • Voice Chat
    Communicate with your teammates and coordinate your tactics using in-game voice and text chat.
    Stay connected and strategize effectively to secure victory.
  • Replays
    Relive your most epic moments and analyze your gameplay with the replay feature.
    Study your strategies, improve your skills, and showcase your best plays.
  • Streaming Support
    Seamlessly integrate with Twitch and engage with your audience and build a community around your gaming adventures.
  • Low Minimum Requirements
    Enjoy the game on a wide range of PCs, including older systems.
    Experience smooth gameplay and immerse yourself in the action, regardless of your hardware, through a detailed option menu.
name: Imagindar

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-2620M or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 2GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Highly recommend SSD for faster load times
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti 4GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Highly recommend SSD for faster load times
